column1: #text=I was running low on food , so I decided to take a trip to the grocery store .
#text=First I wrote down a list of everything I would need .
#text=Then I hopped in my car and drove over there .
#text=I parked where I could find a space and headed into the store .
#text=I grabbed a shopping cart and went over to the bread section .
#text=There I picked out a good loaf of bread .
#text=After that , I looked at all the fruits and vegetables .
#text=I picked out a bag of oranges and kept going .
#text=There were a few more items on the list , so I found each one and put them in my cart .
#text=Once I finished finding everything on my list , I went over to the check out lines .
#text=I found a line with only one person in front of me , so I waited there .
#text=When it was my turn , I put my items on the conveyor belt .
#text=Then the cashier scanned my items and gave me a total .
#text=I swiped my credit card and paid for my items .
#text=She then gave me a receipt , and I took my cart back to my car .
#text=I unloaded my bags into my car , and put the cart back in the cart corral .
